sentence.Network_en: Incautiously, Crook had asked where she was.
sentence.Network_cn: 莽撞之下，克鲁克问了她当时在哪里。

sentence.Network_en: A few doors farther on he found another ancient rendezvous and incautiously put his head inside.
sentence.Network_cn: 再过去几家门面,他发现另一个过去经常光顾的场所,于是冒失地探头进去.

sentence.Network_en: A reprimand to someone who incautiously left a terminal unlocked.
sentence.Network_cn: 对那些鲁莽离开,忘了关闭终端的人的谴责.

an incautious remark ; incautious talk ., 轻率的评论 ; 不谨慎的谈话.

entry.tran: 不谨慎的;粗心大意的;轻率的
entry.def: If you say that someone is incautious, you are criticizing them because they do or say something without thinking or planning.

example.ex: In case you think I was incautious, take a look at the map.
example.tran: 如果你认为我不够仔细,就自己看看地图。

sentences.sentence: "one unfortunately sees historic features carelessly lost when estates fall into unsympathetic hands"
